name: Grow!
description:
Grow! - an unusual puzzle game for those who like to plan and take risks.

You start with one flower that grew in the center of the glade. The soil on the glade is divided into "cells". You can plant new flowers only on those cells that are neighbourgh to your sprouts. Each cell of the glade provides a different amount of vital energy. The vital energy is distributed equally between the colors. If the vital energy is not enough for all the flowers, some of them die.

Your task is to grow a “colony” of flowers and fill the whole glade, for the minimum number of turns with the maximum level of vital energy. Achieve a max growth rate!
